TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStructuralComparable

summary.span: 支援集合物件的結構比較。

span.span: Supports the structural comparison of collection objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓您實作自訂的比較的集合成員。The interface enables you to implement customized comparisons for collection members. 也就是說，您可以定義精確的意義一個要前面、 關注或發生在相同位置中的排序順序為第二個集合物件的集合物件。That is, you can define precisely what it means for one collection object to precede, follow, or occur in the same position in the sort order as a second collection object. 然後您可以指定可接受的集合類型會使用此定義介面。You can then specify that this definition be used with a collection type that accepts the interface. 這個介面具有單一成員， ，以決定目前的集合物件的值是小於、 等於或大於第二個物件在排序次序。The interface has a single member, , which determines whether the current collection object is less than, equal to, or greater than a second object in the sort order. 實際的比較之成員的目前執行個體與第二個物件中的項目由執行介面實作，其中包含您的自訂比較的定義。The actual comparison of the members or elements in the current instance with those in a second object is performed by an interface implementation, which contains the definition of your custom comparison. > [!NOTE] > 介面支援結構化的比較來排序或順序。The interface supports only structural comparisons for sorting or ordering. 介面支援自訂比較的結構是否相等。The interface supports custom comparisons for structural equality. .NET Framework 會提供兩個預設比較子。The .NET Framework provides two default comparers. 其中一個由屬性; 所傳回的其他屬性。One is returned by the property; the other is returned by the property. 泛型的元組類別 (， ，等等) 和類別提供的明確實作介面。The generic tuple classes (, , , and so on) and the class provide explicit implementations of the interface. 轉型 （在 C# 中)，或轉換 （在 Visual Basic)，因此目前的執行個體的陣列或 tuple介面值，並提供您做為引數的實作方法中，您可以定義的自訂排序次序陣列或集合。By casting (in C#) or converting (in Visual Basic) the current instance of an array or tuple to an interface value and providing your implementation as an argument to the method, you can define a custom sort order for the array or collection. 不過，您不能呼叫在大部分情況下直接的方法。However, you do not call the method directly in most cases. 相反地，方法會呼叫這類排序方法。Instead, the method is called by sorting methods such as . 在此案例中，您定義您實作並將它做為引數傳遞至排序方法或集合物件的類別建構函式。In this case, you define your implementation and pass it as an argument to a sorting method or collection object's class constructor. 每當集合排序然後自動呼叫您的自訂比較子具有方法。The method with your custom comparer is then called automatically whenever the collection is sorted. ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列物件，其中包含三個美國城市從 1960年到 2000年的人口資料。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1960 to 2000. 6-tuple 的第一個元件是縣 （市） 名稱。The sextuple's first component is the city name. 其餘五個元件從 1960年代表母體擴展在十年的時間間隔，為 2000年。The remaining five components represent the population at ten-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`類別提供實作，可讓 sextuples 排序任何一種及其元件的陣列。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of sextuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 兩個值可供`PopulationComparer`其建構函式中的類別： 定義排序次序中，元件和布林值，指出是否應該以遞增或遞減順序排序的 tuple 物件的位置。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: the position of the component that defines the sort order, and a Boolean value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 此範例會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的項目、 依第三個元件 （從 1970年中母體擴展） 和顯示它們，並再依照第六個元件 （2000年中母體擴展） 排序它們並加以顯示。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1970) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 方法呼叫會隱含地陣列中每個 tuple 物件的方法。The method is called implicitly by the method for each tuple object in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int CompareTo (object other, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Public Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer
public: int CompareTo(System::Object ^ other, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer);
abstract member CompareTo : obj * System.Collections.IComparer -> int

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前執行個體比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 物件，此物件會比較目前集合物件的成員與對應的 成員。

span.span: An object that compares members of the current collection object with the corresponding members of .

summary.span: 判斷目前的集合物件在排序次序中位於另一個物件之前、相同位置或之後。

span.span: Determines whether the current collection object precedes, occurs in the same position as, or follows another object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一個帶正負號的整數，指出排序次序中目前集合物件與 的關聯性：

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relationship of the current collection object to in the sort order:

returns.span: - 若小於 0，目前的執行個體在 之前。

span.span: - If less than 0, the current instance precedes .

returns.span: - 若等於 0，目前的執行個體與 相等。

span.span: - If 0, the current instance and are equal.

returns.span: - 若大於 0，目前的執行個體在 之後。

span.span: - If greater than 0, the current instance follows .

description.span: 目前的執行個體在 之前。
目前的執行個體與 相等。

span.span: The current instance and are equal.

description.span: 目前的執行個體在 之後。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法支援自訂的結構化比較和排序陣列和 tuple 物件。The method supports custom structural comparison and sorting of array and tuple objects. 方法呼叫`comparer`物件的方法來比較個別陣列元素或開頭之第一個元素或元件的元組元件。The method calls the `comparer` object's method to compare individual array elements or tuple components, starting with the first element or component. 個別呼叫結束和下列情況之一時，方法會傳回一個值：The individual calls to end and the method returns a value when one of the following conditions becomes true: - 方法會傳回-1。The method returns -1. - 方法會傳回 1。The method returns 1. - 方法呼叫的最後一個項目或集合物件中的元件。The method is called for the last element or component in the collection object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列物件，其中包含三個美國城市從 1960年到 2000年的人口資料。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1960 to 2000. 6-tuple 的第一個元件是縣 （市） 名稱。The sextuple's first component is the city name. 其餘五個元件從 1960年代表母體擴展在十年的時間間隔，為 2000年。The remaining five components represent the population at ten-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`類別提供實作，可讓 sextuples 排序任何一種及其元件的陣列。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of sextuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 兩個值可供`PopulationComparer`其建構函式中的類別： 定義排序次序中，元件的位置和值，指出是否應該以遞增或遞減順序排序的 tuple 物件。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: the position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 此範例會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的項目、 依第三個元件 （從 1970年中母體擴展） 和顯示它們，並再依照第六個元件 （2000年中母體擴展） 排序它們並加以顯示。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1970) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫實作。Note that the example does not directly call the implementation. 方法呼叫會隱含地陣列中每個 tuple 物件的方法。The method is called implicitly by the method for each tuple object in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 這個執行個體和 屬於不相同的型別。

span.span: This instance and are not the same type.
